title: I’m a Teacher in Gaza. My Students Are Barely Hanging On.
Israeli forensics experts examine remains handed over by militants in Gaza
description: DEIR AL-BALAH, Gaza Strip (AP) — Israel on Tuesday said it had received remains handed over by Palestinian militants in Gaza to the Red Cross.  Israel’s government said the “findings” were taken for forensics testing.

title: The Gaza Genocide Has Not Ended. It Has Only Changed Its Form.
Mass wedding in Gaza celebrates new life after years of war and tragedy
description: Eman Hassan Lawwa was dressed in traditional Palestinian prints and Hikmat Lawwa wore a suit as they walked hand-in-hand past the crumbled buildings of southern Gaza in a line of other couples dressed in exactly the same way.  The 27-year-old Palestinians were among 54 couples to get married Tuesday in a mass wedding in war-ravaged Gaza that represented a rare moment of hope after two years of devastation, death and conflict.  "Despite everything that has happened, we will begin a new life," Hikmat Lawwa said.

title: The Security Council’s Resolution on Gaza Makes Trump Its New Overlord
'Everything is soaked': Winter rains in Gaza bring new misery for Palestinians
description: DEIR AL-BALAH, Gaza Strip (AP) — Children and families in Gaza scooped muddy water from their tents on Tuesday, trying to protect the few belongings that remain after two years of war.  Winter's heavy rains have left displaced Palestinians splashing in water that reaches their ankles, and blaming both Israel and Hamas for the misery that remains despite a ceasefire.  “All tents were destroyed,” said Assmaa Fayad in Deir al-Balah in central Gaza, whose shelter was damaged in Tuesday’s latest downpour.

title: Starbucks Malaysia Operator Sees Business Rebound After Boycotts
description: The operator of Starbucks in Malaysia says business is gradually recovering after the Gaza conflict-triggered boycotts led to store closures and steep losses.

title: Secret U.S.-Russia talks led to plan that blindsided Ukraine
description: Witkoff and Dmitriev forged the plan during an October meeting in Miami that included Jared Kushner, Trump’s son-in-law, who worked with Witkoff on the Israel-Gaza peace deal.

title: Taking out Hamas' million-dollar 'root' tunnel is game changer, analyst says
description: The IDF uncovers one of Gaza's largest underground Hamas infrastructures stretching 25 meters deep beneath civilian sites including mosques and schools in Rafah.
